name: Romanticism
description: Expressive and emotional qualities, especially in terms of melody.

children.name: Grand opéra
children.description: French style characterized by its enlarged scope and sense of grandeur, with bigger orchestras and casts, and ornate sceneries and costumes.

children.name: Grand opéra

children.name: New German School
children.description: Mid-19th-century Romantic movement experimenting in harmonics and form and engaged in social issues.

children.description: Mid-19th-century Romantic movement experimenting in harmonics and form and engaged in social issues.

children.name: Romantische Oper
children.description: Early 19th century Germanic style of Opera influenced by German Folk Music and legends with a focus on fantasy, emotivity, heroic figures, and nationalism.

children.name: Saint Petersburg School
children.description: Interrelated circles of 19th century Russian Western Classical Music composers focused on developing a distinctly Russian national style.
